clinical_study.brief_title: Tolerance and Digestibility of a New Formula in Healthy Infants
clinical_study.official_title: Study of Tolerance and Lipid Digestibility of a Formula in Healthy 3 Months Infants

brief_summary.textblock: The great majority of infants formula contain fats exclusively from vegetable oil. Nevertheless, the use of both vegetable and dairy lipids is on a real interest to obtain an infant formula closer to the nutritional composition of maternal milk.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: lipid content determination in feces during a 3 days period of collection after 15d and 30d of formula intake

arm_group.description: new formula with dairy lipids and soluble milk proteins

intervention.intervention_name: dairy lipids and soluble milk proteins
intervention.description: one month formula supplementation feces are collected during a 3 days period after 15 and 30 days of formula intake
